mapper.select: select c.comp_id, c.comp_name, e.est_id, e.est_name, d.dept_id, d.dept_name, d.upper_dept_id from company c left join establishment e on c.comp_id = e.comp_id left join department d on e.est_id = d.est_id order by c.comp_id, e.est_id, d.dept_id;

select c.comp_id, c.comp_name, e.est_id, e.est_name, null as dept_id, null as dept_name from company c left join establishment e on c.comp_id = e.comp_id where e.est_id = #{estId} union select c.comp_id, c.comp_name, e.est_id, e.est_name, d.dept_id, d.dept_name from company c left join establishment e on c.comp_id = e.comp_id left join department d on e.est_id = d.est_id where e.est_id = #{estId} and d.dept_level = 1;

select c.comp_id, c.comp_name, e.est_id, e.est_name, d.dept_id, d.dept_name, NULL as position_code, NULL as position_name, NULL as grade_code, NULL as grade_name, NULL as user_id, NULL as user_name from company c left join establishment e on c.comp_id = e.comp_id left join department d on e.est_id = d.est_id where d.dept_id = #{deptId} UNION ALL select c.comp_id, c.comp_name, e.est_id, e.est_name, d.dept_id, d.dept_name, p.position_code, p.position_name, g.grade_code, g.grade_name, u.user_id, u.user_name from organization_user o left join user u on o.user_id = u.user_id left join department d on o.dept_id = d.dept_id left join position p on o.position_code = p.position_code left join grade g on o.grade_code = g.grade_code left join establishment e on d.est_id = e.est_id left join company c on e.comp_id = c.comp_id where d.dept_id = #{deptId};

select comp_id, comp_name, null as est_id, null as est_name, null as dept_id, null as dept_name from company where comp_id = #{compId} UNION select c.comp_id, c.comp_name, e.est_id, e.est_name, null as dept_id, null as dept_name from company c left join establishment e on c.comp_id = e.comp_id where c.comp_id = #{compId} union select c.comp_id, c.comp_name, e.est_id, e.est_name, d.dept_id, d.dept_name from company c left join establishment e on c.comp_id = e.comp_id left join department d on e.est_id = d.est_id where c.comp_id = #{compId} order by comp_id, est_id, dept_id;

select comp_id, comp_name, null as est_id, null as est_name, null as dept_id, null as dept_name, NULL as position_code, NULL as position_name, NULL as grade_code, NULL as grade_name, NULL as user_id, NULL as user_name from company where comp_id = #{compId} union select c.comp_id, c.comp_name, e.est_id, e.est_name, d.dept_id, d.dept_name, NULL as position_code, NULL as position_name, NULL as grade_code, NULL as grade_name, NULL as user_id, NULL as user_name from company c left join establishment e on c.comp_id = e.comp_id left join department d on e.est_id = d.est_id where c.comp_id = #{compId} union select c.comp_id, c.comp_name, e.est_id, e.est_name, d.dept_id, d.dept_name, p.position_code, p.position_name, g.grade_code, g.grade_name, u.user_id, u.user_name from organization_user o left join user u on o.user_id = u.user_id left join department d on o.dept_id = d.dept_id left join position p on o.position_code = p.position_code left join grade g on o.grade_code = g.grade_code left join establishment e on d.est_id = e.est_id left join company c on e.comp_id = c.comp_id where c.comp_id = #{compId} order by comp_id, est_id, dept_id, user_id;

select c.comp_id, c.comp_name, e.est_id, e.est_name, null as dept_id, null as dept_name from establishment e left join company c on c.comp_id = e.comp_id where e.est_id = #{estId} union select c.comp_id, c.comp_name, e.est_id, e.est_name, d.dept_id, d.dept_name from establishment e left join company c on c.comp_id = e.comp_id left join department d on e.est_id = d.est_id where e.est_id = #{estId} order by comp_id, est_id, dept_id;

select c.comp_id, c.comp_name, e.est_id, e.est_name, d.dept_id, d.dept_name, NULL as position_code, NULL as position_name, NULL as grade_code, NULL as grade_name, NULL as user_id, NULL as user_name from establishment e left join company c on e.comp_id = c.comp_id left join department d on e.est_id = d.est_id where e.est_id = #{estId} union select c.comp_id, c.comp_name, e.est_id, e.est_name, d.dept_id, d.dept_name, p.position_code, p.position_name, g.grade_code, g.grade_name, u.user_id, u.user_name from organization_user o left join user u on o.user_id = u.user_id left join department d on o.dept_id = d.dept_id left join position p on o.position_code = p.position_code left join grade g on o.grade_code = g.grade_code left join establishment e on d.est_id = e.est_id left join company c on e.comp_id = c.comp_id where e.est_id = #{estId};

WITH RECURSIVE RecursiveDept AS ( SELECT c.comp_id, c.comp_name, e.est_id, e.est_name, d.dept_id, d.dept_name FROM department d left join establishment e on d.est_id = e.est_id left join company c on e.comp_id = c.comp_id WHERE dept_id = #{deptId} UNION SELECT c.comp_id, c.comp_name, e.est_id, e.est_name, d.dept_id, d.dept_name FROM department d JOIN RecursiveDept rd ON d.upper_dept_id = rd.dept_id left join establishment e on d.est_id = e.est_id left join company c on e.comp_id = c.comp_id ) SELECT * FROM RecursiveDept;

WITH RECURSIVE RecursiveDept AS ( SELECT c.comp_id, c.comp_name, e.est_id, e.est_name, d.dept_id, d.dept_name, NULL as position_code, NULL as position_name, NULL as grade_code, NULL as grade_name, NULL as user_id, NULL as user_name FROM department d left join establishment e on d.est_id = e.est_id left join company c on e.comp_id = c.comp_id WHERE dept_id = #{deptId} UNION SELECT c.comp_id, c.comp_name, e.est_id, e.est_name, d.dept_id, d.dept_name, NULL as position_code, NULL as position_name, NULL as grade_code, NULL as grade_name, NULL as user_id, NULL as user_name FROM department d JOIN RecursiveDept rd ON d.upper_dept_id = rd.dept_id left join establishment e on d.est_id = e.est_id left join company c on e.comp_id = c.comp_id ) SELECT * FROM RecursiveDept union select c.comp_id, c.comp_name, e.est_id, e.est_name, d.dept_id, d.dept_name, p.position_code, p.position_name, g.grade_code, g.grade_name, u.user_id, u.user_name from organization_user o join user u on o.user_id = u.user_id join department d on o.dept_id = d.dept_id join position p on o.position_code = p.position_code join grade g on o.grade_code = g.grade_code join establishment e on d.est_id = e.est_id join company c on e.comp_id = c.comp_id where d.dept_id = #{deptId};
select * from company where comp_name like concat('%', #{search}, '%');
select c.comp_id, c.comp_name, e.est_id, e.est_name from establishment e join company c on e.comp_id = c.comp_id where est_name like concat('%', #{search}, '%');

select c.comp_id, c.comp_name, e.est_id, e.est_name, d.dept_id, d.dept_name from department d join establishment e on d.est_id = e.est_id join company c on e.comp_id = c.comp_id where dept_name like concat('%', #{search}, '%');

select c.comp_id, c.comp_name, e.est_id, e.est_name, d.dept_id, d.dept_name, p.position_code, p.position_name, g.grade_code, g.grade_name, u.user_id, u.user_name from user u join organization_user o on u.user_id = o.user_id join department d on o.dept_id = d.dept_id join position p on o.position_code = p.position_code join grade g on o.grade_code = g.grade_code join establishment e on d.est_id = e.est_id join company c on e.comp_id = c.comp_id where user_name like concat('%', #{search}, '%');
